history.proof: induction s as [|h' s' IHs]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of IHs (pairmap f x0 (rcons (rcons s' h0) h)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 h' : T s' : seq T h0, h, x0 : T IHs : pairmap f x0 (rcons (rcons s' h0) h) = rcons (pairmap f x0 (rcons s' h0)) (f h0 h) Unable to unify "f x0 h' :: rcons (pairmap f h' (rcons s' h0)) (f h0 h)" with "f x0 h' :: pairmap f h' (rcons (rcons s' h0) h)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
T0: Type
f: T -> T -> T0
s: seq T
x0: T
h: T
h0: T

Goal:
pairmap f x0 (rcons (rcons s h0) h) = rcons (pairmap f x0 (rcons s h0)) (f h0 h)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
pairmap = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) => fix pairmap (x : T1) (s : seq T1) {struct s} : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => f x y :: pairmap y s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T1 -> T2) -> T1 -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments T1, T2 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
behead_rcons : forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), (0 < size s0)%nat -> behead (rcons s0 t) = rcons (behead s0) t where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
rcons_injr : forall s0 : seq ?T, ssrfun.injective (rcons s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
foldl_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0 -> ?T) (x1 : ?T) (s0 : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldl f0 x1 (rcons s0 t) = f0 (foldl f0 x1 s0) t where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type] ?T0 : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
foldr_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x1 : ?T) (s0 : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f0 x1 (rcons s0 t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x1) s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type] ?T0 : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
size_rcons_pos : forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), (0 < size (rcons s0 t))%nat where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
head_rcons : forall (x1 : ?T) (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), head x1 (rcons s0 t) = head t s0 where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
rcons_dec : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P (rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
rcons_ind : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P s0 -> P (rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
rcons_injl : forall x : ?T, ssrfun.injective (fun x1 : seq ?T => rcons x1 x) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
behead_rev : forall s0 : seq ?T, behead (rev s0) = rev (belast s0) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- Type]
mem_seq1 : forall x y : eqtype.Equality.sort ?T, (x \in [:: y]) = eqtype.eq_op x y where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T -> T0 s : seq T h0 : T h : T x0 : T |- eqtype.Equality.type]
pairmap_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T1), pairmap f x (s1 ++ s2) = pairmap f x s1 ++ pairmap f (last x s1) s2
zip_rcons : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (x : S) (y : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s x) (rcons t y) = rcons (zip s t) (x, y)
size_pairmap : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s : seq T1), size (pairmap f x s) = size s
map_rcons : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), [seq f i | i <- rcons s x] = rcons [seq f i | i <- s] (f x)
last_ind : forall (T : Type) (P : seq T -> Type), P [::] -> (forall (s : seq T) (x : T), P s -> P (rcons s x)) -> forall s : seq T, P s
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
nth_pairmap : forall (T1 : Type) (x1 : T1) (T2 : Type) (x2 : T2) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> forall x : T1, nth x2 (pairmap f x s) n = f (nth x1 (x :: s) n) (nth x1 s n)
map_flatten : forall (S T : Type) (f : T -> S) (ss : seq (seq T)), [seq f i | i <- flatten ss] = [seq f y | x <- ss, y <- x]
drop_rcons : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s) -> forall x : T, drop n0 (rcons s x) = rcons (drop n0 s) x
headI : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), rcons s x = head x s :: behead (rcons s x)
pmap_cat : forall (aT rT : Type) (f : aT -> option rT) (s t : seq aT), pmap f (s ++ t) = pmap f s ++ pmap f t
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
reshape_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (sh : seq nat) (n : nat), let m := sumn sh in ssrnat.addn m n = size s -> reshape (rcons sh n) s = rcons (reshape sh (take m s)) (drop m s)
scanlK : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1), (forall x : T1, ssrfun.cancel (g x) (f x)) -> forall x : T1, ssrfun.cancel (scanl g x) (pairmap f x)
pairmapK : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1), (forall x : T1, ssrfun.cancel (f x) (g x)) -> forall x : T1, ssrfun.cancel (pairmap f x) (scanl g x)
take_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> take (S n) s = rcons (take n s) (nth x0 s n)
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
List.map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : seq A), (forall a : A, List.In a l -> f a = g a) -> List.map f l = List.map g l
List.map_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l l' : seq A), List.map f (l ++ l')%list = (List.map f l ++ List.map f l')%list
List.map_rev : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : seq A), List.map f (List.rev l) = List.rev (List.map f l)
Variant last_spec (T : Type) : seq T -> Type := LastNil : last_spec [::] | LastRcons : forall (s : seq T) (x : T), last_spec (rcons s x) For last_spec: Argument T is implicit For LastRcons: Argument T is implicit For last_spec: Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope] For LastNil: Argument scope is [type_scope] For LastRcons: Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
pmap = fun (aT rT : Type) (f : aT -> option rT) => fix pmap (s : seq aT) : seq rT := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => let r := pmap s' in ssrfun.Option.apply (fun x0 : rT => x0 :: r) r (f x) end : forall aT rT : Type, (aT -> option rT) -> seq aT -> seq rT Arguments aT, rT are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : seq T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: s' => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope nat_scope]
ssrfun.canLR : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT) (x : rT) (y : aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> x = f y -> g x = y
eq_from_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), size s1 = size s2 -> (forall i : nat, ssrnat.leq (S i) (size s1) -> nth x0 s1 i = nth x0 s2 i) -> s1 = s2
filter_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (a : pred T2) (s : seq T1), [seq x <- [seq f i | i <- s] | a x] = [seq f i | i <- s & pred_of_simpl (preim f a) i]
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
ssrfun.can_inj : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> ssrfun.injective f
foldl = fun (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) => fix foldl (z : R) (s : seq T) {struct s} : R := match s with | [::] => z | x :: s' => foldl (f z x) s' end : forall T R : Type, (R -> T -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]

```coq
induction s as [|h' s' IHs].
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite IHs. reflexivity.
Qed.```
